channel.title: broken Skybox textures when map is compiled without HDR
channel.description:
Hello guys,
not sure if you are aware of this but when I compile my map without HDR, skybox textures get stretched and do not look as intended. When I compile with HDR there are no problems at all.
Greetings...

item.title: broken Skybox textures when map is compiled without HDR
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
Maps should ALWAYS be compiled with HDR only. Our game does not support LDR.

This also has the advantage of reducing your BSP sizes and halving your compile times.

Read full topic
item.source: broken Skybox textures when map is compiled without HDR
